tools.name: review-code
tools.description: Perform a comprehensive code review on the specified files or directory. Returns detailed feedback on code quality, potential bugs, and improvement suggestions.
tools.prompt: You are an expert code reviewer. Review the code at {{target}}. Focus on: {{focusAreas}}

inputs.name: target
inputs.description: The file path, directory, or glob pattern to review

inputs.name: focusAreas
inputs.description: Specific areas to focus on (e.g., 'security, performance, readability')

tools.name: suggest-tests
tools.description: Analyze code and suggest test cases that should be written to ensure good coverage.
tools.prompt:
Analyze the code at {{target}} and suggest comprehensive test cases.

Consider:
1. Unit tests for individual functions
2. Edge cases and boundary conditions
3. Error handling scenarios
4. Integration test opportunities

Provide specific test case descriptions with expected inputs and outputs.

inputs.name: target
inputs.description: The file or directory to analyze for test suggestions
